column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I could not finish my stay in Chicago without trying the Deep Dish Pizza; and Lou Malnati's was my choice. And it was a great choice! My girlfriend and I order a salad and a small pizza (with peperoni) to share. Perfect amount for late lunch! The salad was good and very well dressed
column2: and the deep dish pizza met our expectations. It was full of cheese and a great tomato sauce
column3: and we enjoyed the peperoni: they were very tasty. All of this including a couple of beers cost us $31. Good price for THE Chicago experience. The only negative point
column4: the service was quite impersonal. Just so-so. But the place deserves a visit!
